summary: Cyberattacks are on the rise and pose risks to the nation's critical infrastructure—which relies on computer systems to function. These attacks can compromise sensitive data and disrupt important operations. We testified about our work on cybersecurity challenges and on the Biden Administration's efforts to "harmonize" federal cybersecurity regulations—to ensure they don't burden infrastructure operators with overlapping requirements. Recently, the Administration and Congress have started efforts...
title: Cybersecurity: Efforts Initiated to Harmonize Regulations, but Significant Work Remains
